data.name: EnHanced Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Soundtrack of EnHanced!

• Over 61 different songs!
• Featuring the best beepboop songs from EPIC BLARGMAN
• Files are 320kbps MP3 files!
• Includes a track list
• There’s 62 different songs!
• You'll find them at \\Steam\steamapps\common\EnHanced\EnHanced Original Soundtrack



Track Listing:
01 Counterintuitive Lamppost (Logo) (00:07)
02 Where is that Pesky Any Key (Title Screen) (01:37)
03 Everything on the Menu (Main Menu) (01:34)
04 There’s Only One H for This Job (Intro) (00:35)
05 Familiar Sights (Waking Up) (02:17)
06 Lonely Struggle (Infiltrated Holding Bay) (01:12)
07 EnHance (Pause Menu) (01:03)
08 Maintenance (Save Menu) (00:50)
09 Demolished Dreams of Decent Hallways (Devastated Passage) (01:39)
10 Drifting Vulgarities (Flooded Coolant System) (04:14)
11 Suspenseful Corners (Pre-Boss) (00:33)
12 Wires Crossed (Troubling Trio) (01:30)
13 Tension EnHanced (Boss Pause Menu) (00:30)
14 Hot Metal Collars (Febrile Reactor) (02:07)
15 Strive 4 Lyfe (Striver) (01:24)
16 Too Bad You’re a Gonner (Game Over) (00:09)
17 EnHanced (Nexus) (02:22)
18 Think of the Bambino (First Memory) (00:31)
19 Moving On Up To Floor Number 2 (Surface Lift) (01:36)
20 Lampposts in the Rain (Ponderous Surface) (01:18)
21 Gigantaj on a Roll (Surface Chase) (01:55)
22 Mechanisms Gone Astray (Surface Observatory) (01:55)
23 Weirdo Sense of Humour (Second Memory) (02:59)
24 Safe Base (Locked Door) (00:39)
25 Apartmentalization (Residential Sector) (01:11)
26 Ride or Fall Off (Muso) (01:07)
27 Good Plot but Writing’s Rather Dull (Diary Entries) (02:03)
28 Scrutinizers in the Air (Communal Observation) (02:19)
29 Consternation Above (Unregulated Humidity Regulator) (02:39)
30 Treading Trepidation (Main Control Room) (01:41)
31 Disconsolate Arsenal (Darksuit) (01:35)
32 The Haunting Larank Theme (03:05)
33 Pipe Dreams of Safety (Infested Pipeline) (02:54)
34 Shifting Truo (Malsana Returns) (02:54)
35 DogFlap in Honorem Dei (Third Memory) (00:52)
36 Echoes Resound (Demolished Holding Bay) (01:18)
37 Deadly Deathsphere (Berg) (01:25)
38 Antediluvian Primogenitor (Limus) (02:47)
39 Professional Party Transgressor (Larank Rulez) (01:35)
40 More Than 01 Reasons (Rusted Penitentiary) (03:34)
41 Diary of Woes and Woahs (Forth Memory) (01:13)
42 Theme of Pirbs Past (H-GUY Title Screen) (01:52)
43 Do The Thing!! (H-GUY Start) (00:06)
44 H-Guy Goes and Does It (H-GUY Level) (02:29)
45 Outboss the Bosses (H-GUY Boss) (01:36)
46 And You’re still a gonner (H-GUY Game Over) (00:03)
47 You’re a Winner Is You (H-GUY Won The Thing!) (01:47)
48 Disconsolate Passageway (Teruro Koridoro) (00:36)
49 Korinklino Malkontenta (Terminal Seven) (00:36)
50 Transdimensional Disseminator (Nova) (01:26)
51 Transdimensia Difinilo (Nova) (01:26)
52 Plibonigo (Splice Pause) (00:27)
53 Archetypenemy (G-Roil) (01:52)
54 Malevolent Enmity (Premilo Vorlex) (04:05)
55 Grand Curdler of the Mood (?) (01:52)
56 Hopping Mad (?) (03:07)
57 Ode to Animosity (Final Boss) (03:03)
58 Reflective Ennui (Ending) (01:08)
59 Onus of Creation (Credits) (01:13)
60 Meanwhile, the Mysterious Manipulates (Secret Ending, Yes There is One) (02:47)
61 Bonus - Consternation Above (Sans Filter) (02:39)
62 Bonus - Shifting Truo (Malsana Intensifies) (02:49)

data.short_description: The Soundtrack of EnHanced, over 61 songs by EPIC BLARGMAN!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Anything that can handle the lofty 'mp3' format
  • Processor: One that cna run an OS and a media player AT THE SAME TIME!!
  • Memory: 125 MB RAM
  • Graphics: It's music so visualiser quality is largely on you
  • Storage: 245 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A functional existing one
  • Additional Notes: This is the soundtrack, you don't need too much to listen to it
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: KroboLabs OS 8000
  • Processor: Blast-Processing capable
  • Memory: 777 MB RAM
  • Graphics: One that cost thousands when it came out then was a few hundred a month later
  • Storage: 245 MB available space
  • Sound Card: One capable of changing digital information into Processed Sound Waves
  • Additional Notes: This is a collection of MP3s, if you can play and hear EnHanced itself then it'll be all fine

data.legal_notice:
EnHanced (C) Erik Bell 2018
Music (C) Keith Brinley 2018
